column4: hi out there... Im trying to activate USB's at SUN virtualBox but without success...
and what USB device do you want to attach?
i have 3 devices , usb-stick, camera and modem
I restart my computer but still the same problem with usb
but what device do you want to connect? A FDD? A camera?
when no machine is active I can configure the filters... but when the machine runs, all USB devices are grayed out...
did you try right-clicking the USB icon in the VirtualBox system tray?
thats where they are grayed out...
thats where they are grayed out... (status bar)
go to the #vbox chat room and ask there
Don't mention it, I did nothing :(
